content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map during these steps. Repeated attempts to supply a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) failed, and no Lab or other crafted building was added. Although existing smelting structures (a furnace at (5.0, 5.0) and a copper furnace at (–27.0, –60.0)) were referenced for resource processing, no new structure was deployed by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
– API Usage for Entity Retrieval
  • Avoid passing unexpected keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or extra positional arguments to get_entities. Use the correct parameter structure and verify the function’s expected inputs.
  • Check the return value from get_entities before iterating over it to prevent “NoneType” iteration errors.

– Lab Placement Issues
  • Ensure the Lab item is present in the inventory prior to attempting placement. An absence of the item causes placement failures.

– Lab Crafting Chain Problems
  • Verify that all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, copper cables, and copper plates) are available or can be produced with a proper setup before attempting to craft a Lab.
  • Confirm that each step in the crafting chain is feasible – for instance, ensuring that furnaces or crafting machines are available to process items like electronic-circuit sub-ingredients.
  • Compare the inventory counts against crafting requirements to avoid shortages (e.g., missing iron-gear-wheel x2) that lead to persistent crafting failures.
